## hpr1299 :: What's in my Bag

 I go through the usual stuff in my bag. One thing I forgot to say
is that my laptop is a Toshiba Satellite with i3 processor, 6gb of
RAM, 750gb hard drive running Crunchbang Linux. Here are links to two
of the items mentioned in the episode. 

Zoom H1 audio recorder: https://www.zoom.co.jp/products/h1/
